TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
FBI OPEN UP, YOU ARE UNDER ARREST FOR DOWNLOADING WIKIPEDIA!

I wish for a 1000-THR Earthmover

Granted: It moves the Earth out of the sweet zone and we all perish.

I wish for a sign of hope.

Granted. You get a massive sign that has the word hope on it. The sign falls over in your driveway and you are unable to move it.

I wish for hydrazine.

You get a hydra covered in zine. Good luck trying to rid it from your house!

I wish for a toolgun and Physics gun

Granted. You disassemble the pen with a spring inside.

I wish for a legacy code.

Granted: You get a Leg Acey code, you can now have Creeper legs on your Minecraft avatar.

I wish for balloons.

Granted. You are at the N/S Korea border. They are having a balloon festival this week.

I wish a balloon could reach the Moon.

The moon now comes within 1 kilometer of the Earth's surface.

I wish for a pie-flavoured pie

Granted. You receive liver pie flavored pie. Bon Appetit.

I wish to learn the secret of the eternal donut.

Granted, here is a donut made from liver and kidneys. It will last forever.

I wish I could sleep right now.

Granted: You are, this life is just a dream.

I wish this was a life I could wake up from.

You take the red pill. 

Welcome to wonderland.

I wish you needed a licence to fly a rocket.

Granted, but you have to get it at the Department of Manned space Vehicles (DMV). Have fun.

I wish for an actual concept of NASA's lunar base and deep space vehicle.

Granted. You watch Flash Gordon (the movie).

I wish Space Hunter was a series.

Granted: Each week the crew visit the house of a hoarder looking to squeeze just on more thing into their overflowing space.

I wish the series "Galaxy Rangers" had been more successful.

Granted. The galaxy is arranged.

I wish the Power Rangers weren't out of power.

Granted: They turn evil and take over the world.

I wish the unmasked Power Rangers were as good as the covered ones.

Granted. The covered ones turn as equally bad as the unmasked ones.

I wish dead threads could come to life without necroposting.

Granted: They come to life and start eating all the other threads till only the very first thread ever put on the forum exists.

I wish for barter.

Here's a bar of ter.

I wish for a personal bodyguard

Granted: They determine the best way to keep you safe is to lock you in a box.

I wish I knew where people have gone.

You go where they go too, that place being the Backrooms.

I wish a woodchuck could chuck wood

Granted.

Spoiler

 


I wish to leave you for a minute to visit a kitchen.

Granted: You visit Hell's Kitchen.

I wish a web camera that is in orbit so I could visit and look at Earth.

Granted. You still have another orbit (socket) with eye.

I wish you hadn't forgot a spacesuit on your previous wish.
